articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: ZEEKR Intelligent Technology Holding (NYSE:ZK): Revisiting Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness. ZEEKR Intelligent Technology Holding (NYSE:ZK) has been drifting slightly lower over the past 3 months, even as revenue and net income have grown at a solid clip. That mismatch raises some interesting valuation questions. See our latest analysis for ZEEKR Intelligent Technology Holding. articles.title: PNC’s Early Move Into Direct Bitcoin Trading Might Change The Case For Investing In PNC (PNC)
articles.mainIdea: PNC’s Early Move Into Direct Bitcoin Trading Might Change The Case For Investing In PNC (PNC)
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: PNC’s Early Move Into Direct Bitcoin Trading Might Change The Case For Investing In PNC (PNC). Earlier in December 2025, PNC Bank became the first major U.S. bank to enable eligible PNC Private Bank clients to buy, hold and sell spot bitcoin directly through its own digital platform, using Coinbase’s Crypto-as-a-Service infrastructure. This move meaningfully expands PNC’s digital asset capabilities for high- and ultra-high-net-worth clients, tightening the link between traditional private banking services and the crypto market. We’ll now explore how this early move into direct bitcoin... Related tickers mentioned: BTC-USD, COIN, PNC.

articles.title: Why Did Crypto Funds See $952M in Outflows as Bitcoin Slipped and Altcoins Drew Fresh Inflows?
articles.mainIdea: Why Did Crypto Funds See $952M in Outflows as Bitcoin Slipped and Altcoins Drew Fresh Inflows?
articles.summary: 99bitcoins: Why Did Crypto Funds See $952M in Outflows as Bitcoin Slipped and Altcoins Drew Fresh Inflows?. Crypto investment products saw a clear shift in fund flows last week, with net outflows reaching about $952M. The move ended nearly four weeks of steady inflows into digital asset investment vehicles and marked the first weekly pullback over that period.
